mapper.select: SELECT *, (select opt_name from opt where c.opt_ssd = opt.opt_no) as ssd_name, (select opt_name from opt where c.opt_hdd = opt.opt_no) as hdd_name, (select opt_name from opt where c.opt_os = opt.opt_no) as os_name, (select opt_sale_price from opt where opt.opt_no = c.opt_ssd and opt_category = 0) as ssd_price, (select opt_sale_price from opt where opt.opt_no = c.opt_hdd and opt_category = 1) as hdd_price, (select opt_sale_price from opt where opt.opt_no = c.opt_os and opt_category = 2) as os_price FROM cart c LEFT JOIN computer co ON c.computer_no = co.computer_no AND c.item_category = 0 LEFT JOIN peripheral pe ON c.peripheral_no = pe.peripheral_no AND c.item_category = 1 WHERE c.cart_user = #{cartUser}
